Night science should be different and novel, because as we all know, biomes change radically transitioning from night to day to night again.

Interesting, but i belive it should only give different reports, not bonus points.

i wonder if the thermometer instrument gives different readings depending on light exposure...
Well not ALL of the instruments, the thermometer should give different readings, but planets without atmospheres don't change anything else but temperature drastically over night.
It's also reasonable to assume that planets with a significant day/night temperature difference may also experience seismic activity due to surface expansion & contration....
